means: 感激( appreciate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: We hadn't appreciated how much work was involved in organizing a wedding.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们没有意识到筹备婚礼有多少事情要做.

sentence.Network_en: Any assistance you could give the police will be greatly appreciated.
sentence.Network_cn: 您提供的任何帮助警方都将万分感谢。

sentence.Network_en: To be appreciated as a parent is quite unusual.

PerfectNetExp.abs: applause are the only appreciated interruption .89掌声是唯一令人欣赏的干扰。
I decided that brevity would be as much appreciated as eloquence ., 我感到简短肯定和言辞动听一样受人们赞赏.
her talent for music was not appreciated .她的音乐才能无人赏识。
Kenya's success story has demonstrated mobile money's potential , and its benefits are to be more widely appreciated .肯尼亚的成功昭示了移动钱包的潜力无限，它的好处也越来越受到人们的重视。

list.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... precious a 珍贵的 appreciate v 评价；欣赏 appreciative a 有欣赏力的.
九年级英语单词表 ... suppor 支持；帮组 appreciate 感激 donation 捐赠物；捐赠.
金融词汇 - 豆丁网 ... Appeals panel 上诉委员会 Appreciation [财产] 增值；涨价 Appropriation 拨款；经费；指拨金额.
商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... yield 产量收益,收益率 increase in value,appreciation 增值,升值 duty 税.

entry.def: If you appreciate something, for example a piece of music or good food, you like it because you recognize its good qualities.

example.tran: 任何人都能欣赏我们的音乐。

example.ex: In time you'll appreciate the beauty and subtlety of this language.
example.tran: 总有一天你会体会到这门语言的优美和微妙之处。

entry.def: If you appreciate a situation or problem, you understand it and know what it involves.

example.ex: She never really appreciated the depth and bitterness of the Irish conflict...
example.tran: 她从来没有真正认识到爱尔兰矛盾的深刻和激烈。

example.ex: He appreciates that co-operation with the media is part of his professional duties.
example.tran: 他懂得与媒体合作是自己工作职责的一部分。

entry.def: If you appreciate something that someone has done for you or is going to do for you, you are grateful for it.

example.ex: Peter stood by me when I most needed it. I'll always appreciate that...
example.tran: 当我最需要的时候，彼得在我身边支持我。我将永存感激。

entry.def: If something that you own appreciates over a period of time, its value increases.

example.ex: They don't have any confidence that houses will appreciate in value.
example.tran: 他们完全不相信房子会升值。

sentences.sentence: "a thing comprehended is a thing known as fully as it can be known"

auth_sentence.content: It was that human element that Swindon fans appreciated.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was that human element that Swindon fans appreciated.

auth_sentence.content: Thanks again for the feedback, it is appreciated.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thanks again for the feedback, it is appreciated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thanks again for the feedback, it is appreciated.

auth_sentence.content: Some people appreciated this but sadly some did not.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some people appreciated this but sadly some did not.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some people appreciated this but sadly some did not.

Sentence.sentence: The elderly appreciated the care and attention they received.
